structure.unit: A HOSPITALIZATION OF THE MENTALLY ILL

law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 445, sec. 44, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 332, sec. 19.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Rules and regulations on patients' rights, use of seclusion and restraints, transfer and release.
metadata.lrc-note: . This section was repealed in 1982 Acts, Chapter 445, which contains the following language in Section 45 of that Act: "This Act shall become effective on July 1, 1982." The Ky. Constitution, in Section 55, requires that a reason be set forth for the emergency. However, no reason is set forth in this Act. The effective date for 1982 Acts with no emergency provision is July 15, 1982.
